About Us

Cain Dental Studio is a full-service dental laboratory offering crown & bridge (including zirconia and emax), dentures, partials and cast partials. We are also fully-trained on all major implant systems, including: Astra BioHorizons Biomet 3i Implant Direct Imtec 3M Nobel Biocare Straumann In addition, we are also fully-trained in the implementation of Straumann, Nobel Biocare and Rhein 83 over denture systems. We pride ourselves on our high level of craftsmanship, attention to detail and patient satisfaction. Terence Cain RDT is available for custom shading for patients, either in lab or at your dental office. We also offer an efficient and courteous pickup and delivery service. Please don't hesitate to contact us today.
